title: Unable to delete selected emails
content: I use TBird/GMail on two Windows 11 machines - a desktop and a laptop. In my All Mail folder there many emails promoting misc items, in fact over 1000 that I do not want. I have set server settings to delete immediately but no matter how I try the deleted emails reappear. They are not in the Bin or Trash. I get the same results using either the laptop or the desktop. Any ideas?
creator: b.chapman093

title: cant download and enter in to use
content: this week I changed my Google Password and using Google, I can not access my Mozilla any longer to download it. It will download but when I want to finish it comes up with a screen as if Mozilla is broken. It lies within my Google new password I am sure, but I dont know how to fix it.

title: Groups (Thunderbird) How do I make?
content: I am a newbie to T-bird, and need to make an email group for sending email.
creator: nikilou23

title: Attachments to email from icloud to gmail not appearing in Thunderbird
content: I use Thunderbird as my email client for three different Gmail accounts. One of my contacts in one of these accounts regularly sends me Word documents as attachments from an icloud address. The email comes through on Thunderbird but there is no attachment. When I go straight to Gmail via my browser (Firefox) the attachment is there. None of my other contacts has this issue. The only one affected is the one person using an icloud address.
creator: kelandjennie

title: Ricezione Mail
content:
Buongiorno, ho un problema usando thunderbird con windows 11.

Le mail PEC mi arrivano con 1/2 giorni di ritardo. questo succede più o meno da giugno 2025

Grazie a chi può aiutarmi

Moreno.
creator: zancatomoreno

title: Dotaz na poštovního klienta.
content: Nejde mi odeslat email a ani žádný nepřichází při odesílání to po mne chce heslo ale to nefunguje.Nevím co jsem udělal špatně kde je chyba. Čísla v odchozí poště i příchozí jsou v pořádku.Už jsem tento problém měl a řešil jsem to pres telefon ale zatím jsem konakt nenašel.Díky za info Jirka
creator: jitka.a.jirka.korinkovi
